sentences.sContent: Then all three of you sign the contract and post in on the fridge.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then all three of you sign the contract and post in on the fridge.
sentences.sCn: 然后你们三个人要都在协议上签名，并把它贴在冰箱上。

sentences.sContent: I want this beer to chill so I'll leave it in the fridge for an hour.
sentences.sContent_eng: I want this beer to chill so I'll leave it in the fridge for an hour.
sentences.sCn: 我想要啤酒变凉，因此我把它放在冰箱里一小时。

sentences.sContent: It can be anything: spoiled milk from the back of your fridge right down to tar and feathers.
sentences.sContent_eng: It can be anything: spoiled milk from the back of your fridge right down to tar and feathers.
sentences.sCn: 它可以是任何玩意儿：从你冰箱后面那些变质的牛奶到沥青和羽毛。

trans.tranOther: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, used for keeping food and drinks cool
